CustomField.formula: IF (OR(ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status_Category__c,"In Signatures2"), ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status_Category__c,"In Filing2"), AND(ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status_Category__c,"In Authoring2"),ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Source__c,"Other Party Paper2"))), IF(OR($User.UIThemeDisplayed == 'Theme4d2', $User.UIThemeDisplayed == 'Theme4t2'), HYPERLINK("/apex/Apttus__LightningAgreementActivate?id=" &Id, IMAGE("/resource/Apttus__Button_Activate", "Activate"),"_self") , HYPERLINK("/apex/Apttus__AgreementActivate?id=" &Id, IMAGE("/resource/Apttus__Button_Activate", "Activate"),"_self")),NULL)
CustomField.label: Activate_Custom
